_comment: Shared translations used across the application

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Immaniġġja l-preferenzi tal-kont u s-settings tas-sigurtà tiegħek

profile.title: Informazzjoni tal-Profil
profile.description: Aġġorna l-informazzjoni personali u l-preferenzi tiegħek
profile.emailCannotBeChanged: L-indirizz elettroniku tiegħek ma jistax jinbidel

security.title: Sigurtà
security.description: Immaniġġja s-sigurtà u l-aċċess tal-kont tiegħek
security.2FADescription: Żid saff żejjed ta' sigurtà fil-kont tiegħek. (Ġej dalwaqt)

accountManagement.title: Ġestjoni tal-Kont
accountManagement.description: Azzjonijiet permanenti tal-kont - jekk jogħġbok ipproċedi b'kawtela
accountManagement.deleteAccountWarning: Din l-azzjoni hija irriversibbli u se tħassar b'mod permanenti d-data kollha tiegħek, inklużi d-dokumenti mtellgħin u l-istruzzjonijiet ippreparati. L-informazzjoni dwar il-wirt diġitali tiegħek se titneħħa kompletament mis-sistemi tagħna.
accountManagement.confirmDescription: Din l-azzjoni ma tistax titreġġa' lura. Dan se jħassar b'mod permanenti l-kont tiegħek u jneħħi d-data kollha tiegħek mis-servers tagħna.
accountManagement.confirmEmailPrompt: Jekk jogħġbok ittajpja l-indirizz elettroniku tiegħek {{email}} biex tikkonferma:

errors.passwordFieldsRequired: Jekk jogħġbok imla l-oqsma kollha tal-password
errors.passwordTooShort: Il-password il-ġdida għandha tkun twila mill-inqas 6 karattri
errors.deleteAccountSupport: It-tħassir tal-kont għandu jintalab permezz tal-appoġġ. Jekk jogħġbok ikkuntattjana għall-għajnuna.

privacySettings.control_how_your_documents_are_2: Control how your documents are processed and stored
privacySettings.choose_how_documents_are_proce_4: Choose how documents are processed by default
privacySettings.combines_local_and_cloud_ai_fo_6: Combines local and cloud AI for optimal performance and privacy
privacySettings.processes_documents_entirely_i_8: Processes documents entirely in your browser for maximum privacy
privacySettings.you_can_always_override_this_s_10: You can always override this setting when uploading individual documents

dataTransparency.loadingError: Unable to load transparency data. Please try again later.
dataTransparency.title: Your Data, Your Control
dataTransparency.description: We believe in total transparency. Here's exactly how we handle your information.

recentActivity.title: Recent Activity
recentActivity.premiumText: Your 30-day operational log provides basic security. For maximum accountability and peace of mind, upgrade to the Command Package to maintain a complete, unchangeable audit history of every action taken in your vault, forever.

dataOwnership.title: Data Ownership
dataOwnership.description: You own your data, always. You can download a complete copy at any time.

cookies.bannerText: Aħna nużaw cookies essenzjali biex niżguraw il-funzjonament tajjeb tas-sit tagħna. Bil-kunsens tiegħek, nistgħu nużaw ukoll cookies analitiċi biex intejbu s-servizzi tagħna.

policy.title: Cookie Policy
policy.subtitle: Understanding how we use cookies to improve your experience while respecting your privacy

overview.title: Important Information
overview.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how LegacyGuard uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.
overview.point1: We use cookies to ensure the basic functionalities of our website
overview.point2: Some cookies are essential and cannot be disabled
overview.point3: You can control non-essential cookies through our consent manager
overview.point4: We never sell your data or use cookies for invasive tracking

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly
necessary.purpose: Enable core functionality such as security, identity verification, and network management. These cookies cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website
analytics.purpose: Collect anonymous information about how you use our site, helping us improve user experience and identify issues.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.purpose: Track visitors across websites to display ads that are relevant and engaging for individual users.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.purpose: Allow the website to remember choices you make (such as language or region) and provide enhanced, personalized features.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.description: You have full control over your cookie preferences
yourRights.right1: Access information about the cookies we use
yourRights.right2: Withdraw consent for non-essential cookies at any time
yourRights.right4: Opt-out of analytics and marketing cookies

contact.title: Contact Us About Cookies
contact.description: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us:
contact.addressDetails: LegacyGuard Ltd, Data Protection Office, 123 Privacy Street, Dublin, Ireland
